sub_topic: Moduli spaces of algebraic curves and their properties
message_1: Consider the moduli space M₃ of stable algebraic curves of genus three. Determine the dimension of M₃.
message_2:
To determine the dimension of the moduli space M₃ of stable algebraic curves of genus three, we can use the formula for the dimension of the moduli space of curves of genus g:

dim(M_g) = 3g - 3

In our case, g = 3, so we have:

dim(M₃) = 3(3) - 3 = 9 - 3 = 6

Therefore, the dimension of the moduli space M₃ of stable algebraic curves of genus three is 6.
